custom-sql.sql: SELECT categorydataid as masterdataid ,'C-'||categorydataid as referenceid, categoryvalue as value , 'C-'||categoryvalue as code_ FROM md_category;
SELECT subcategorydataid as masterdataid , subcategoryvalue as value , 'SC-'||subcategoryvalue as code_ , 'SC-'||subcategorydataid as referenceid FROM md_subcategory where categoryid = ? ;
SELECT typeid as masterdataid ,'C-'||typeid as referenceid, 'C-'||typevalue as code_, typevalue as value FROM md_type;
SELECT deliverymodeid as masterdataid , 'C-'||deliverymodeid as referenceid, 'C-'||deliverymodevalue as code_, deliverymodevalue as value FROM md_deliverymode;
SELECT filecodeid as masterdataid , 'C-'||filecodeid as referenceid, 'C-'||filecodevalue as code_, filecodevalue as value FROM md_filecode;
SELECT basicheaddataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||basicheaddataid as referenceid , basicheadvalue as value , basicheadcode as code_ FROM md_basichead;
SELECT primaryheaddataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||primaryheaddataid as referenceid , primaryheadvalue as value , primaryheadcode as code_ FROM md_primaryhead where basicheaddataid = ?;
SELECT secondaryheaddataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||secondaryheaddataid as referenceid , secondaryheadvalue as value , secondaryheadcode as code_ FROM md_secondaryhead where primaryheaddataid = ?;
SELECT teritaryheaddataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||teritaryheaddataid as referenceid , tertiaryheadvalue as value , tertiaryheadcode as code_ FROM md_tertiaryhead where secondaryheaddataid = ?;
SELECT organizationdataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||organizationdataid as referenceid , organizationvalue as value , organizationcode as code_ FROM md_organization ;

SELECT suborganizationdataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||suborganizationdataid as referenceid ,'C-'||suborganizationvalue as code_ , suborganizationvalue as value FROM md_suborganization where organizationdataid = ?;
SELECT receiptcategorydataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||receiptcategorydataid as referenceid , 'C-'||receiptcategoryvalue as code_ , receiptcategoryvalue as value FROM md_receiptcategory;

SELECT receiptcategorydataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||receiptcategorydataid as referenceid , 'C-'||receiptsubcategoryvalue as code_ , receiptsubcategoryvalue as value FROM md_receiptsubcategory where receiptcategorydataid = ?;
SELECT countrydataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||countrydataid as referenceid , countryvalue as value , countrycode as code_ FROM md_masterdatacountry ;
SELECT statedataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||statedataid as referenceid , statecode as code_ ,statevalue as value FROM md_masterdatastate where countrydataid = ?;
SELECT basicheaddataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||basicheaddataid as referenceid , basicheadvalue as value , basicheadcode as code_ FROM md_basichead where basicheaddataid = ? ;
SELECT primaryheaddataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||primaryheaddataid as referenceid , primaryheadvalue as value , primaryheadcode as code_ FROM md_primaryhead where primaryheaddataid = ?;
SELECT secondaryheaddataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||secondaryheaddataid as referenceid , secondaryheadvalue as value , secondaryheadcode as code_ FROM md_secondaryhead where secondaryheaddataid = ?;
SELECT tertiaryheaddataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||tertiaryheaddataid as referenceid , tertiaryheadvalue as value , tertiaryheadcode as code_ FROM md_tertiaryhead where tertiaryheaddataid = ?;
SELECT count(*) FROM public.jet_process_docfile where userpostid = ?;
SELECT count(*) FROM public.jet_process_receipt where userpostid = ?;
SELECT filecodeid as masterdataid , 'C-'||filecodeid as referenceid , filecodevalue as value , filecodevalue as code_ FROM md_filecode where filecodeid = ? ;
SELECT categorydataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||categorydataid as referenceid , categoryvalue as value , categoryvalue as code_ FROM md_category where categorydataid = ? ;
SELECT subcategorydataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||categoryid as referenceid , subcategoryvalue as value , subcategoryvalue as code_ FROM md_subcategory where subcategorydataid = ? ;
SELECT typeid as masterdataid , 'C-'||typeid as referenceid , typevalue as value , typevalue as code_ FROM md_type where typeid = ? ;
SELECT deliverymodeid as masterdataid , 'C-'||deliverymodeid as referenceid , deliverymodevalue as value , deliverymodevalue as code_ FROM md_deliverymode where deliverymodeid = ? ;
SELECT organizationdataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||organizationdataid as referenceid , organizationvalue as value , organizationvalue as code_ FROM md_organization where organizationdataid = ? ;

SELECT suborganizationdataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||suborganizationdataid as referenceid , suborganizationvalue as value , suborganizationvalue as code_ FROM md_suborganization where suborganizationdataid = ? ;
SELECT countrydataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||countrydataid as referenceid , countryvalue as value , countryvalue as code_ FROM md_masterdatacountry where countrydataid = ? ;
SELECT statedataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||statedataid as referenceid , statevalue as value , statevalue as code_ FROM md_masterdatastate where statedataid = ? ;

SELECT receiptcategorydataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||receiptcategorydataid as referenceid , receiptcategoryvalue as value , receiptcategoryvalue as code_ FROM md_receiptcategory where receiptcategorydataid = ? ;

SELECT receiptsubcategoryid as masterdataid , 'C-'||receiptsubcategoryid as referenceid , receiptsubcategoryvalue as value , receiptsubcategoryvalue as code_ FROM md_receiptsubcategory where receiptsubcategoryid = ? ;
